title: His Heart's Delight
description: A sweet Regency set romance from New York Times bestselling author Mary Blayney. The Braedon Family Series, Book One.  Morgan Braedon is not the slightest bit interested in marriage though his family thinks itâ€™s essential to his future. Morgan needs one more year at the gaming tables to reach his financial goals and then he will walk away from gambling forever.  Christiana Lambert is not the slightest bit interested in marriage to anyone but her childhood sweetheart who is fighting abroad. While he is away she is going to London to party and avoid men with marriage on their mind.  Morgan and Christiana meet and plan a sham courtship to fool his family and guarantee her an escort. But love takes them by surprise and the game changes more than one life.
author: Mary Blayney
